text: Phakathi kwabo bangamaYuda, kukho abasusa amazwi kwindawo yawo yemfanelo bathi: “Siyaliva ilizwi lakho (Muhammad) singathobeli,” sikumamela senze ungevi kwanto.” (Baze bathi): “Râ’inâ”, bagqwethe amalwimi abo begculela inkolo (yeIslam) ukanti ukuba babethe, “Siyeva, sithobele, senze siqonde”, bekuya kubalungela oko, kube koko kuchanekileyo; kodwa uAllâh Ubaqalekisile ngokungakholwa	kwabo,	ke	kaloku	bona	abakholwa ngaphandle kwabambalwa (kubo)
